Key Match Events: Jurickson Profar robbed Mookie Betts of a home run in the first inning
Manny Machado directed expletives at Jack Flaherty a handful of times
Pre-Game Insights: Padres team president Erik Greupner credited fans with creating the best home-field advantage in baseball while reiterating that any fan who throws items onto the field or makes offensive, foul or abusive comments to anyone will be ejected
Padres manager Mike Shildt said he would never disparage a player on another team or an entire team
Dodgers infield Max Muncy said the atmosphere at Petco Park the last several years 'has been tops in baseball'
Post-Match Reflections: Padres manager Mike Shildt praised Manny Machado for his professionalism and leadership
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres drew a club-record 3,314,593 fans to the downtown ballpark this season
The Dodgers are making a pitching substitution for Game 3
Others: The Padres are trying to get under the Dodgers' skins by creating an emotional atmosphere at Petco Park
